pageNotFound_spelling: If you typed the web address, check it is spelled correctly.
pageNotFound_copiedAddress: If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.
pageNotFound_movedPage: If the web address is correct or you selected a link, the page may have moved.
pageNotFound_goToStartPage: To register a limited partnership, go to the Register a limited partnership start page.
errorPage_tryLater: You will be able to use the service at a later date.
errorPage_moreInfo: Email enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk, if you need more information.
